sources.title: Chiwawa (2019)
sources.description: In Tokyo, Chiwawa is a popular girl. One day, her dead body is found in Tokyo Bay. Her body is in pieces. Chiwawa's friends gather to remember her, but they realize they do not know anything about her, like her real name or her background. (Source: AsianWiki)

metadata.Plot: In Tokyo, Chiwawa is a popular girl. One day, her dead body is found in Tokyo Bay. Her body are in pieces. Chiwawa's friends gather to remember her, but they realize they do not know anything about her like her real name or her background.
metadata.Actors: Mugi Kadowaki, Ryo Narita, Kan'ichirô Satô
